item.title: By: DougNic
item.dc:creator: DougNic
item.description: <p>as i said in my email, since when is DWI OK? correct answer not very often and not near my aquifer. we are environmentalists right?</p>
item.content:encoded: as i said in my email, since when is DWI OK? correct answer not very often and not near my aquifer. we are environmentalists right?

item.title: By: Will
item.dc:creator: Will
item.description: Doug, I agree with your point, but you should read the Sierra Club statement again more closely. The Sierra Club never came out in support of FutureGen (unlike ELPC and CUB) and the point of the statement you quoted is that money should be invested in other alternatives besides coal.
item.content:encoded: Doug, I agree with your point, but you should read the Sierra Club statement again more closely. The Sierra Club never came out in support of FutureGen (unlike ELPC and CUB) and the point of the statement you quoted is that money should be invested in other alternatives besides coal.

item.description: <p>[...] DougNic put up a good read today.Here’s a quick excerpt:Where is the outrage here. And what is Angela Tin thinking us downstaters will trade Lung Cancer for Stomach Cancer when we drink polluted water? This is crazy but even the Sierra Club gets into the act.http://illinois.sierraclub.org/ … [...]</p>
